job.title: Web Developer
job.description: H&W Solutions is looking for a skilled web developer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining storefronts for our company. You will be working as the sole technical developer on a small team responsible.To succeed in this role, you will need to be proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node JS, React JS, and have solid knowledge and experience in programming applications. C#, Java, XSL would be helpful.Storefront Web Developer Responsibilities:â¢	Website and software application designing, building, or maintainingâ¢	Using scripting or authoring languages, management tools, content creation tools, applications, and digital mediaâ¢	Conferring with teams to resolve conflicts, prioritize needs, develop content criteria, or choose solutionsâ¢	Directing or performing Website updates.â¢	Performing DNS Management and SSL Management using CloudFlare and IIS respectivelyâ¢	Developing or validating test routines and schedules to ensure that test cases mimic external interfaces and address all browser and device typesâ¢	Maintaining an understanding of the latest Web applications and programming practices through education, study, and participation in conferences, workshops, and groupsâ¢	Back up files from Web sites to local directories for recoveryâ¢	Evaluating code to ensure it meets industry standards, is valid, is properly structured, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systemsâ¢	Determining user needs by analyzing technical requirementsStorefront Web Developer Requirements:â¢	Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience or Bachelor's degree in Web development or related fieldâ¢	Solid knowledge and experience in programming applications. [Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code preferred]â¢	Proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node JS, React JSâ¢	Proficient in SQL. [MSSQL]â¢	Other useful skills: C#, Java, XSL, XMPie - uStoreâ¢	Dedicated team playerâ¢	Great written, verbal, presentation, and communication skillsâ¢	Knowledge of programming language and technical terminologyâ¢	Able to develop ideas and processes and clearly express themâ¢	Ability to function well, with limited supervision and directionâ¢	Must maintain solid attention to detail, with the ability to follow through on commitmentsâ¢	Ability to function well, with limited supervision and directionH&W Solutions supports a diverse workforce and is an Equal Opportunity Employer who does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, gender, color, religion, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, veteran status or other classification protected by law. H&W is a Drug Free Workplace with a Zero Tolerance Substance Abuse Policy and participates in the Georgia Drug Free Workplace Program.
